TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior

.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public Class DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior Implements IOperationBehavior, IWsdlExportExtension
type DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior = class interface IOperationBehavior interface IWsdlExportExtension

Docs.summary: 表示 的运行时行为。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> 支持控制 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 选项，例如 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> 和 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> 属性。 其中的一些属性只能使用类的构造函数设置。 在这种情况下， <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> 可以使用方法替换 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.CreateSerializer%2A> 。 有关数据协定的详细信息，请参阅 [使用数据协定](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts)。
有关使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior> 替换属性返回的的详细信息 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate> <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior.DataContractSurrogate%2A> ，请参阅 [数据协定代理](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates)项。
## Examples 下面的示例在某操作的行为集合中查找 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior>，并重置 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph%2A> 和 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject%2A> 属性。
[!code-csharp[DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/datacontractserializeroperationbehavior/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/datacontractserializeroperationbehavior/vb/source.vb#1)]
